tracking.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_SERIALIZATION_TRACKING_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_TRACKING_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // tracking.hpp:
00011

00019 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00020 #include <boost/static_assert.hpp>
00021 #include <boost/mpl/eval_if.hpp>
00022 #include <boost/mpl/identity.hpp>
00023 #include <boost/mpl/int.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/mpl/equal_to.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/mpl/greater.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/mpl/integral_c_tag.hpp>
00027 
00028 #include <boost/type_traits/is_base_and_derived.hpp>
00029 #include <boost/type_traits/is_pointer.hpp>
00030 #include <boost/serialization/level.hpp>
00031 #include <boost/serialization/tracking_enum.hpp>
00032 
00033 namespace boost {
00034 namespace serialization {
00035 
00036 struct basic_traits;
00037 
00038 // default tracking level
00039 template<class T>
00040 struct tracking_level {
00041     template<class U>
00042     struct traits_class_tracking {
00043         typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME U::tracking type;
00044     };
00045     typedef mpl::integral_c_tag tag;
00046     // note: at least one compiler complained w/o the full qualification
00047     // on basic traits below
00048     typedef
00049         BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME mpl::eval_if<
00050             is_base_and_derived<boost::serialization::basic_traits, T>,
00051             traits_class_tracking<T>,
00052         //else
00053         BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME mpl::eval_if<
00054             is_pointer<T>,
00055             // pointers are not tracked by default
00056             mpl::int_<track_never>,
00057         //else
00058         BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME mpl::eval_if<
00059             // for primitives
00060             BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME mpl::equal_to<
00061                 implementation_level<T>,
00062                 mpl::int_<primitive_type> 
00063             >,
00064             // is never
00065             mpl::int_<track_never>,
00066             // otherwise its selective
00067             mpl::int_<track_selectively>
00068     >  > >::type type;
00069     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(int, value = tracking_level::type::value);
00070 };
00071 
00072 
00073 template<class T, enum tracking_type L>
00074 inline bool operator>=(tracking_level<T> t, enum tracking_type l)
00075 {
00076     return t.value >= (int)l;
00077 }
00078 
00079 } // namespace serialization
00080 } // namespace boost
00081 
00082 
00083 // The STATIC_ASSERT is prevents one from setting tracking for a primitive type.  
00084 // This almost HAS to be an error.  Doing this will effect serialization of all 
00085 // char's in your program which is almost certainly what you don't want to do.  
00086 // If you want to track all instances of a given primitive type, You'll have to 
00087 // wrap it in your own type so its not a primitive anymore.  Then it will compile
00088 // without problem.
00089 #define BOOST_CLASS_TRACKING(T, E)           \
00090 namespace boost {                            \
00091 namespace serialization {                    \
00092 template<>                                   \
00093 struct tracking_level< T >                   \
00094 {                                            \
00095     typedef mpl::integral_c_tag tag;         \
00096     typedef mpl::int_< E> type;              \
00097     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(                   \
00098         int,                                 \
00099         value = tracking_level::type::value  \
00100     );                                       \
00101     /* tracking for a class  */              \
00102     BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT((                    \
00103         mpl::greater<                        \
00104             /* that is a prmitive */         \
00105             implementation_level< T >,       \
00106             mpl::int_<primitive_type>        \
00107         >::value                             \
00108     ));                                      \
00109 };                                           \
00110 }}
00111 
00112 #endif // BOOST_SERIALIZATION_TRACKING_HPP
